title: ONLINE LEARNING PLATFORM
description: Students can enroll in courses, access video lectures uploaded byinstructors, complete assessments, and receive certificates uponsuccessful completion

title: COMMUNITY RESOURCE SHARING PLATFORM
description: Utilizes JavaScript and tree data structure to efficiently organize and distribute resources among community members.

title: STUDENT GRADEBOOK MANAGEMENT
description: To efficiently store and retrieve student grades and CGPA. Students have access to view their academic performance, while staff  can add, update, and delete records.
